docs.snippet: Ed supports disaster-relief measures suggested by UN Assn of US and '80 Project of Council on Foreign Relations calling for improved technologies for detecting and monitoring disasters and better coordination of relief efforts; agrees that politic...
docs.abstract: Ed supports disaster-relief measures suggested by UN Assn of US and '80 Project of Council on Foreign Relations calling for improved technologies for detecting and monitoring disasters and better coordination of relief efforts; agrees that politics poses major obstacle to effective disaster relief but contends developing nations should realize that such relief is an essential human right

docs.snippet: President Nixon's proposal to give states the major role in disaster relief "could lead to 50 different levels of disaster assistance," the Red Cross told Congress today....
docs.abstract: Red Cross pres G M Elsey on Sept 12 tells Subcom on Disaster Relief that Pres Nixon's proposal to give states major role in disaster relief could lead to '50 different levels' of disaster assistance; Adm proposal also draws criticism from Sen G McGovern (S Dakota), but receives qualified support of nation's Govs at hearing; Elsey urges subcom to take hard look at concept of state responsibility for disaster assistance; questions fiscal, manpower and structural abilities of states to assume responsibilities which involve rapid action and unpredictable requirements
docs.lead_paragraph: President Nixon's proposal to give states the major role in disaster relief "could lead to 50 different levels of disaster assistance," the Red Cross told Congress today.

headline.main: Red Cross Criticizes Plan For States' Role on Relief

docs.snippet: The Senate passed and sent to the White House today compromise legislation to lower the interest rate on disaster loans....
docs.abstract: Sen, by voice vote, passes and sends to Pres Nixon compromise legis to lower interest rate on disaster loans despite warning by Sen Tower that bill might be vetoed; legis would provide Fed loans with interest as low as 1% to businessmen, homeowners and farmers hit by disasters; other provisions of bill noted
docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate passed and sent to the White House today compromise legislation to lower the interest rate on disaster loans.

headline.main: Disaster Loan Bill Passed And Sent to White House

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 22 (AP) -- President Eisenhower reported to Congress today that $9,000,000 of his emergency funds were used last year to meet disasters in eight states....
docs.abstract: Pres Eisenhower repts $6 million of emergency funds were used in 8 states, '58
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 22 (AP) -- President Eisenhower reported to Congress today that $9,000,000 of his emergency funds were used last year to meet disasters in eight states.

headline.main: DISASTER AID DETAILED; President Allocated 6 Million to Eight States Last Year

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb.2--Wendell B. Barnes, head of the Small Business Administration, today ordered the conversion of all disaster loans made by that agency, from 6 per cent to a 3 per cent annual interest rate....
docs.abstract: SBA cuts annual interest rate on loans from 6 to 3%; bill increasing lending authority to $125,000 signed; Sen passes bill liberalizing home-repair loans

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb.2--Wendell B. Barnes, head of the Small Business Administration, today ordered the conversion of all disaster loans made by that agency, from 6 per cent to a 3 per cent annual interest rate.

headline.main: BILL EASING LOANS IN DISASTER SIGNED

docs.snippet: An agreement under which American Red Cross units across the country will be able to call on the membership of the National Defense Transportation Association for assistance in disaster relief emergencies was signed yesterday....
docs.abstract: Defense Transportation Assn signs pact to aid ARC
docs.lead_paragraph: An agreement under which American Red Cross units across the country will be able to call on the membership of the National Defense Transportation Association for assistance in disaster relief emergencies was signed yesterday.

headline.main: RED CROSS TO GET AID OF TRANSPORT GROUP

docs.snippet: GENEVA, Oct. 31 -- The Executive Committee of the League of Red Cross Societies decided today to expand the services provided by the League Secretariat to national societies in the field of disaster relief. It also adopted an eight-point statement...
docs.abstract: Red Cross Socs League to extend services to natl chaps; adopts 8-point statement of principles
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Oct. 31 -- The Executive Committee of the League of Red Cross Societies decided today to expand the services provided by the League Secretariat to national societies in the field of disaster relief. It also adopted an eight-point statement of principles to be followed by Red Cross societies in times of national disaster.

headline.main: WORLD RED CROSS WILL EXPAND FIELD; Decides at Geneva to Enlarge Its Services to National Societies in Disasters

docs.abstract: Bill to coordinate disaster relief activities passed, Sen; appropriation noted

docs.snippet: Divers philosophers, mainly ancient, have prattled about the benefits of poverty, but their definition of it usually means that you are to have all you need but no superfluities. So the Greeks, not strikingly moderate, were always praising "measur...
docs.lead_paragraph: Divers philosophers, mainly ancient, have prattled about the benefits of poverty, but their definition of it usually means that you are to have all you need but no superfluities. So the Greeks, not strikingly moderate, were always praising "measure," and warning against the arrogant excess of prosperity that invited punishment from fate.
